title: New Detroit Distillery Is Part Of A Growing Trend
teaser: Detroit City Distillery is the second distillery in Detroit and among some three dozen in Michigan.
contentencoded:
Detroit might be going through bankruptcy, but the commerce of Detroit is growing in some areas. A new business that will open this summer is the latest in a fast-growing trend.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Lester Graham of Michigan Radio reports onÂ Detroit City Distillery, the second distillery in Detroit, and one of about three dozen in Michigan.

  • Read more on this story via Michigan Radio

Reporter

  • Lester Graham, reporter for Michigan Watch, the investigative unit of Michigan Radio. He tweets @MichiganWatch.
